name: Cyber Spin
description: Cyber Spin is a futuristic racing video game that was released in 1992 to Japan and North America for the Super NES. It is known in Japan as Shinseiki GPX: Cyber Formula (新世紀GPXサイバーフォーミュラ, New Century GPX Saiba Fomyura, "New Century GPX Cyber Formula") which is based on the anime Future GPX Cyber Formula, and because of that, it has the proper license to use the characters from the anime.
